Helping Hands for Freedom Puts on Freedom To Rock EventHelping Hands for Freedom is a nation-wide nonprofit organization that helps support military children and families facing loss, injury, and deployment. One of the events that Helping Hands for Freedom is putting on is called Freedom to Rock. Proceeds for this event will benefit children and families of our heroes that have put their lives on the line for our country.Freedom to Rock will be a night full of awesome 80’s music, live auctions, food, and comedy. Again, the proceeds for Freedom to Rock directly helps the families of our heroes!visit https://lnkd.in/gx4eGab

Business Overview:The FundMyBusinessAZ.com portal uses advanced technology to connect investors together online with quality investment opportunities that meet the states standards. We offer education and consulting services relating to the equity Crowdfunding Provisions, assistance in preparing and reviewing disclosure documents, and posting the entrepreneurs projects on our website. Our website features include escrow and accounting services, esignature, payment processing, bad actor checks, anti-money laundering oversight as well as an on-line deal room for confidential document sharing. We also offer fund readiness assessments as a service and offer resources to our entrepreneurs as appropriate. Our services are available to Arizona residents only.
7440 E Pinnacle Peak Rd #140 Scottsdale, AZ 85255

Mr. Andrews is an entrepreneurial real-estate executive with 18+ years of full service real estate & note brokerage nationwide. Proven track record of creating and implementing asset optimization & recovery programs for regional banks by implementing workout strategies, distressed asset & note sales as well as collateral substitutions.Multidisciplinary professional known for facilitating corporate growth and change for real estate and non-real estate clients by customizing and implementing solutions relating to financing arrangements, asset management, and development of divestiture strategies for distressed assets. Proven work ethic, team-oriented mentality, relationship minded with banking and loan origination expertise.QUALIFICATIONS SUMMARY	♦ Proven leader and results-driven manager with demonstrated effectiveness in managing people, systems, resources, and finances while meeting goals and achieving success in sales and marketing, including market research, planning, advertising, promotion, and sales management. ♦ Creative visionary with ability to think outside the box, oversee design of fresh marketing/advertising materials, and implement, initiate, and sell new ideas.♦ Proficient interpersonal communicator who is adept at speaking effectively, writing concisely, and negotiating, as well as expressing, transmitting, and interpreting knowledge and ideas.Core Competencies♦Asset Stabilization Recovery		 ♦Bank Note/REO Acquisition	 ♦OREO Dispositions♦Property/Asset Management	 	 ♦Broker Price Opinion		 ♦Lender Representation♦Commercial Investment Feasibility	 ♦Sale/Leaseback		 ♦Strong Interpersonal Skills  Certified Commercial Investment Member (CCIM)  Real Estate Broker State of Arizona

List, Market and Sell various types of Real Estate including Commercial, Land, Industrial, Single Family Residential, Vacant Land in Maricopa & Pinal Counties. Responsible for Marketing via Internet, Print media and Marketing Meetings. Brokerage was in the top 20% of all brokerages in Maricopa County in 2006. Successfully negotiated a 45 million dollar purchase of an Apartment Complex. Managed an average of 45 agents and brokers as Designated Broker. Sold over 200 million dollars of Real Estate

Fun Centers of America at Talking Stick will be one of the largest and most technologically advanced family entertainment center of its kind. The building size, based on the architectural renderings is just less than 67,000 square feet on approximately 6 acres of land. This unique entertainment facility will specialize in family fun and will cater to the K-12 students and their parents. We plan to open 100 locations in North America.President & CEO As the lead developer, visionary and spokesperson for this project he identified a nitch opportunity that is socially responsible, creates an average of 140 jobs for young adults and reaps above average financial returns.  Notable Accomplishments:* Assembled an amazing team to move this project from conception to reality.* Spearheaded the efforts to finalize the concept, site plan and placement of the attractions.* Drafted the business plan, offering memorandum and private placement memorandum. * Identified the location, completed a comprehensive market analysis and underwrites all capital raise options.Core Competencies ♦Construction Activities 		♦Development 			♦Asset Stabilization & Recovery    ♦Property/Asset Management	 	♦Timeline Management		♦Lender Representation    ♦Commercial Investment Feasibility	♦Finance		 	♦Acquisition & Disposition

Started as a salesperson and over time earned my broker’s license.I was mentored by a man named Ray Kateb who had 47 years or Real Estate Experience. Upon my Brokers death I became half owner of Rightland Realty I built the company up 22 agents prior to selling the business in 2003. Nicholas Andrews has climbed his way up the real estate latter for over 15 years and has experience managing and owning a full service real estate and note brokerage company (N.B. Andrews & Associates). He is one of the few Certified Commercial Investment Members worldwide and is continually looking for new business ventures and opportunities. Nicholas is a natural leader who believes in the importance of hard-work and dependability. He is an avid supporter of charitable organizations and finds the volunteer work he is involved with to be very gratifying. Though he is very fond of his career, his most enjoyable moments are spent with his two sons, Gunner and Austin.

Nick Andrews is on my favorite list of people I have ever had the pleasure to know and to work with. He is as "Real" as it gets. Just a down to earth , hard working and genuinely nice person. Its funny because the fist time I met Nick he walked into a crowded room of people and the room went silent. It was as if a celebrity had entered. I know now its because people are drawn to him due to his kind and gentle nature. "Everyone loves Nick"  I highly recommend doing business with Nick on any level. Know that he is a man of his word and the word that stands out most in my mind is Integrity. This combination in business today tends to be hard to find.

summary: I am a Developer & Real Estate Broker in Arizona and my areas of focus are Maricopa County & Pinal County. I manage a full service Real Estate Brokerage and have done so for over 18 years. I am very proficient in both Residential and Commercial, with systems in place to handle the work.Professional Experience:Certified Commercial Investment MemberLicensed Arizona Real Estate Broker 18+ yrs ExperienceExcellent Organizational and Communication SkillsSystematic Problem Solving SkillsSuperior Leadership SkillsAbility to streamline and improve processesBackground in Sales & People Skills	Develop and Maintain Client RelationshipsList, Market, Negotiate and close REO SalesSet office standards and protocolsPerform All necessary REO sales ProceduresTrain and Educate staff on a continuing basisQuality Control ImplementationGOAL:    ADD VALUE IN EVERYTHING I DO:Lead the direction of the Company.Use the CCIM designation to my advantage.Focus on growth of the company.Specialties: Real Estate Broker State of ArizonaCertified Commercial Investment Member (CCIM)Commissioned as “Notary Public” Broker adheres to Cowboy Ethics:Live Each Day with CourageTake Pride in Your WorkAlways Finish What You StartDo What Has To Be DoneBe Tough, But FairWhen You Make A Promise, Keep ItRide For the BrandTalk Less and Say MoreRemember That Some Things Aren’t For SaleKnow Where to Draw The Line
